comments.body: should we may this non-nullable? If a menu item is not available shouldn't we take it off from the menu?

This is used for the "next" button when on the final page of a menu that overflows.  Here's a terrible screenshot of a custom menu that has it, but it also exists in the native-looking menu:

![Screen Shot 2021-01-12 at 1 51 30 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/389558/104378722-4bbb3e00-54dd-11eb-808b-8410fdfd2a7b.png)
